text: is a Japanese Seinen slice of life comedy webmanga series written and illustrated by Aoi Ikebe. Published since 2014 by Shogakukan, the manga is serialized on the site of the seinen web magazine and has been compiled into four tankōbon volumes. It was adapted into a Japanese television drama series that will air on starting in October 25, 2016. ==Volumes== *1 (May 12, 2015) *2 (February 12, 2016) *3 (October 19, 2016) *4 (June 12, 2017) ==Cast== *Aoi Morikawa *Issei Takahashi ==Reception== The manga was number ten on the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! Top 20 Manga for Female Readers survey. ==See also== *Tsukuroi Tatsu Hito, another manga series by the same author ==References== Category:Shogakukan manga Category:NHK original programming Category:Japanese television dramas based on manga Category:Comics adapted into television series Category:2016 Japanese television series debuts Category:Japanese comedy webcomics Category:2010s webcomics Category:Webcomics in print Category:Seinen manga Category:Slice of life anime and manga
title: Princess Maison
